author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bce, depositi o/n in rialzo a 702,981 mld, prestiti marginali 219 mln
text: FRANKFURT, Jan 23 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank reported the following daily data on liquidity provision, in millions of euros. TODAY PREV Use of overnight loan facility 219 237 Use of overnight deposit facility 702,981 692,936 For additional details click here For details of previous ECB overnight lending operations, see: here For data on ECB market operations please click For Reuters calculation of money market liquidity level please click . To see graph, right-click and select 'graph' option. (Reporting by Frankfurt newsroom)
